current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend title 38, United States Code, to prohibit the
		  Secretary of Veterans Affairs from requesting additional medical examinations
		  of veterans who have submitted sufficient medical evidence provided by
		  non-Department medical professionals and to improve the efficiency of
		  processing certain claims for disability compensation by veterans, and for
		  other purposes.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

short-title.#text:
Quicker Veterans Benefits Delivery Act
			 of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
